name: WooCommerce Order Extras
author: Johnson Epo (envoos)

sections.description:
Take control of your WooCommerce orders with the feature-rich WooCommerce Order Extras plugin. This extension introduces additional fields such as delivery agents, payment methods, and payment status, ensuring data integrity. Lock orders with confirmed payments, maintain account consistency, and prevent accidental deletions. Elevate your order management for greater control and reliability.

Features

  • Adds custom order status functionality.
  • Integrates delivery agent information.
  • Adds support for custom payment methods.
  • Enhances WooCommerce order management.
  • Enables the option to require a payment method for each order.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘woocommerce-order-extras’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Ensure WooCommerce is installed and activated.
sections.faq:
Q: Does this plugin work without WooCommerce?

A: No, this plugin requires WooCommerce to be installed and activated.

Q: How to access custom order status, delivery agent, and payment settings?

A: Navigate to the WooCommerce menu in the admin panel. Find submenu options for ‘Custom Order Status,’ ‘Delivery Agent,’ and ‘Payment Extra.’
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Introduces the option to require a payment method for each order. Site administrators can now choose whether a payment method is mandatory for every order.

1.1

  • Adds support for custom payment methods.
  • Improves styles for a better user interface.

1.0

  • Initial release.
sections.screenshots:
1. - Displays both 'Custom Order Status' and 'Delivery Agent' menus in the WooCommerce admin panel.

  2. - Displays the 'Custom Order Status' page with additional settings.

  3. - Displays the 'Delivery Agent' page with additional settings.

  4. - Illustrates the custom fields on the WooCommerce order page.

  5. - Introduces the 'Payment Extra' settings for requiring payment methods.
sections.reviews:
Streamlined Order Processing!

By brinsley on April 15, 2024

Thanks to WooCommerce Order Extras, we now have better control and reliability in managing our orders. The plugin's additional fields have helped us maintain data consistency and prevent accidental deletions. A must-have tool for any WooCommerce store!

Best i have seen so far

By johnpaul51 on April 14, 2024

Absolute Lifesaver! As a small business owner, managing orders was becoming a nightmare until I discovered WooCommerce Order Extras. The additional fields like delivery agents and payment status have made order processing a breeze. Highly recommended!
